name: long ride
description:
Ride skateboard and jump to gain airtime (future currency probably)

alpha 0.6

if you found a bug or have a suggestion, please leave it in the comments. screenshots are from old versions btw, but the gameplay isn't (not for long probably): https://youtu.be/ttSJ8XtxYPM


There is an sfx bug that appears rarely and I have no idea how to fix it, so I hope you won't get it): https://youtube.com/shorts/B-vprfntna4?feature=share
